Action.author: rohitadivi
Action.body: The testing is done but need to discuss how to automate the test case and whether to automate it or no

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: This is not a system test, and the design team can implement with a UT or IT testcase if they so desire. It is not a normal use case, and really does not lend itself to automation, anyways. Closing.
